mapper.update: update community_question set status = #{status} , examination = #{examination} , update_time = #{updateTime} where id = #{id};
update community_question set status = 2,update_time = #{updateTime} where id = #{id};
update community_question set views = views + 1 where id = #{id};
mapper.select: select q.id id,title,author_id,author_avatar,author_username,thumbsup,views,tag_ids,parse_content content,create_time publishTime from community_question q inner join community_question_content c on q.id = c.id where q.examination = 1 and status = 0 order by q.create_time desc limit 4;
select id special_id,author_id,author_username,author_avatar,title special_title,views from community_question where examination = 1 and status = 0 order by views desc limit 4;

select q.id id,title,author_id,author_avatar,author_username,thumbsup,views,tag_ids,c.parse_content content,q.create_time "publishTime",IFNULL(m.comment_count,0) comment_count from community_question q inner join community_question_content c on q.id = c.id left join (select question_id,count(1) comment_count from community_question_comment group by question_id) m on q.id = m.question_id where q.examination = 1 and q.status = 0
AND tag_ids regexp replace("${tag}",' ','')
AND tag_ids regexp replace("${tag}",' ','')
order by q.views desc
order by comment_count desc
order by q.create_time desc
limit #{page},10;

select q.id,title,author_id,author_avatar,author_username,thumbsup,views,create_time "publishTime",md_content content from community_question q inner join community_question_content c on q.id = c.id where q.examination = 1 and status = 0 and q.id = #{id};
